definition: the hollow spine of a feather, defeat someone through trickery or deceit
details:
noun
- the hollow spine of a feather
= synonyms: quill
- a revolving rod that transmits power or motion
= synonyms: rotating shaft
- a long rod or pole, especially the handle of an implement or the body of a weapon like a spear or arrow
= example: a long rod or pole, especially the handle of an implement or the body of a weapon like a spear or arrow
- a long vertical passage sunk into the earth, as for a mine or tunnel
- (architecture) upright consisting of the vertical part of a column
= synonyms: scape
- a vertical passageway through a building, usually used for an elevator
= example: a vertical passageway through a building, usually used for an elevator
- a long pointed rod used as a tool or weapon
= synonyms: lance, spear
- obscene terms for penis
= synonyms: tool
- the main (mid) section of a long bone
= synonyms: diaphysis
- an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect
= synonyms: barb
- a line that forms the length of an arrow pointer
- a column of light (as from a beacon)
= synonyms: irradiation
verb
- defeat someone through trickery or deceit
= synonyms: cheat
- equip with a shaft
